title: Hotel Santa Fe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Western, Beer/Wine, Mexican, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. All vegetarian except for fish. Opened in 1981, the menu at this restaurant is around 50% vegetarian, most of which can be adapted for vegans. The vegetarian and non-veg dishes are prepared in separate areas. The restaurant is under a huge palapa, with views of the ocean that is directly outside. The tofu and tempeh, yogurt, ice cream, granola are made in-house. The vegetarian tamales can be made vegan with 1-2 days advance notice.
